changeSet.author: vitalii.kim
changeSet.sql:
create table if not exists fact_product_cost ( id bigserial primary key,
account_id bigint not null references account (id), product_id bigint not null references dim_product (id),
cost_value numeric(18, 6) not null, currency text not null default 'RUB',
valid_from timestamptz not null, valid_to timestamptz,
created_at timestamptz not null default now(), updated_at timestamptz not null default now(),
constraint chk_fpc_cost_non_negative check (cost_value >= 0),
constraint chk_fpc_valid_range check (valid_to is null or valid_to >= valid_from),
constraint uq_fpc_scd2 unique (account_id, product_id, valid_from) );
create index if not exists idx_fpc_current on fact_product_cost (account_id, product_id) where valid_to is null;
changeSet.rollback: drop index if exists idx_fpc_current; drop table if exists fact_product_cost cascade;
